sinuwalata athulath wiya hakiya: nishpadana mila = nishpadana piriwaya + wedi thabime shrama piriwaya + piriwaya prashastha kirima dan api mema sewawa desa samipawa balamu obata chayarupakaranaye wedi thabime illuma thibe nam, obata pahatha piyawara wetha yomu wiya hakiya: piyawara 1: amathanna sije chayarupa shilpi nishpadithaya saha mila gana katha kirimata saha nishpadanayata anuwa api sadharana uputa dakwimak karannemu.

shri lanka danda nithi sangrahaye 316 saha 314 waganthi yatathe sakakaru waliweriya polisiya mangin athadanguwata gena thibu athara 316 waganthiya yatathe (barapathala nowana thuwala) saha 410 waganthiya yatathe (anarthayak sidukirima) sidukara athi waradi samatha mandalaya wetha yomu kala haki waradi heyin ema naduwa samatha mandalaya wetha yomu karana lesata waliweriya polis sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka rohana munasinha mahatha samanga paminilla meheyawu sarayan jayalath (55392) mahatha wadidura warthawak mangin adhikaranayen illa siti athara ee anuwa naduwa samatha mandalaya wetha yomu kerini.

“awashyathawe muladharmaya palamu warata, 1954di wyawastha sampadaka sabhawa wisuruwa harima sadharanikaranaya kirima sandaha aga winisuru munir wisin bhawitha karana ladi. 1958di eya bhawitha karanu labuwe hamuda kumantha්ranayak yukthiyuktha kirimatayi. 2012 wasaredi pakisthana agamathi gilanita erehiwa pawathi nadu wibhagayedi shreshtadhikaranaya pa්rakasha kale ema dushta awashyathawe muladharmaya wala dama athi bawayi.

´´pinwath brahmanaya, yam kenek pin kirima sandaha kushal kirima sandaha dharma pasak panawathda, ee dharma pasa shramana gauthamayan wahanse waira naththawu, wyapada naththawu, sitha wadima pinisa pawathna sithe piriwara dharmayoyayi kiyannaha.´ mese ki kalhi janussoni brahmana theme siyalla suduwu ashwa rathayen basa uthuru saluwa ek anshayaka kota porawa bhagyawathun wahanse desata andili banda namaskara kota, ´ham rajekuge ratehi arshathwu samyaksambuddhawu thathagathayan wahanse wasaya keredda, ee pasenadi kosol rajahata labhayaki.

watath niyarath goyam kanna se awasanwunu palath palana mathiwaranayata janathawagen 50% kwath chandaya prakasha nokala bawa matanam "loweth" shuwarya.mak nisada yath kehelmal chandayakata wada owunta jiwath wimata "2500" soyagathayuthu nisaya.chandayata pera "pana" ussagena gedarata paminena kisiwek owunata "kola kali" misa hal mitiyak gena noaa nisaya.gena enneda nathi nisaya.hathara parakata prathipala dena wibhaga walata owunge daruwan yawiya yuthu nisaya. 1.8% n nadaththu wana sarasawiwala inna loku puthata,duwata edawela kannata kiyak hari yawiya yuthu nisaya.

ee gana sawistharathmakawa pasuwa karunu idiripath karannata kamaththemu’  nuthana widyathmaka mathaya wanne mulu mahath wishwayema wayasa awurudu biliyana 20kata  wada nomathi bawayi’ sarasankhya kalpa lakshaya kese nam nuthana widyathmaka mathaya samaga ekangathawayakata gena eemata haki da yanna obama sitha balanna’ buduwarayekuge pamanak nowa oonama miniisekuge aayusha adu wadiwana aakaraya pilibanda budu dahama darana mathaya da itha wyakula ha itha awidyathmaka ekaki’  minisunge aayusha kramayen pirihi gos awurudu dahaya paramayushaya wana kalayak paminena bawa abhidharma pothapathehi sandahan ya’ ee kalaye di rogawalin ho yuddhayen ho aahara nathiwimen ho maha minis winashayak siduwana bawath sandahan ya’ ithiri wana tika dena pamanak sucharithayehi hasirima nisa nawathath aayushaya wardhanaya wannata patan gani’ ee aayusha wadima warsha asankhya dakwa wana bawa pawase’ enamudu dusirithata harima nisa nawathath minissu pirihimata patan ganithi’ kramayen pirihi dasha warshaya paramayushaya wana kalayata pamane’ ee kalaye di nawathath minis winashayak we’
